body_html:
@asimshankar :

1st command
ls bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/
output is
ls: bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/: No such file or directory

2nd line
bazel query --config=cuda 'somepath(//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package, //tensorflow/models/embedding:gen_word2vec)'
output is
WARNING: Config values are not defined in any .rc file: cuda
WARNING: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_Kusu/e92c2cbd4935130908d79abb3c6104b0/external/protobuf/protobuf.bzl:90:19: Variables HOST_CFG and DATA_CFG are deprecated in favor of string "host" and "data correspondingly.
WARNING: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_Kusu/e92c2cbd4935130908d79abb3c6104b0/external/protobuf/protobuf.bzl:96:28: Variables HOST_CFG and DATA_CFG are deprecated in favor of string "host" and "data correspondingly
//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
//tensorflow/models/embedding:package
//tensorflow/models/embedding:gen_word2vec

3rd line
bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_backage:build_pip_package
output is
ERROR: /Users/Kusu/tensorflow/tensorflow/python/BUILD:612:1: Executing genrule //tensorflow/python:nn_ops_pygenrule failed: bash failed: error executing command /bin/bach-c ... (remaining 1 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.AbnormalTerminationException: Process terminated by signal 5.
dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libcudart.8.0.dylib
Referenced from: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_Kusu/e92c2cbd4935130908d79abb3c6104b0/execroot/tensorflow/bazel-out/hos/bin/tensorflow/python/gen_nn_ops_py_wrappers_cc
Reason: image not found
/bin/bach: line 1: 15171 Trace/BPT trap:5 bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/python/gen_nn_ops_py_wrappers_cc @tensorflow/python/ops/hidden_ops.txt 1 > bazel-out/local_darwin-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_nn_ops.py
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps

4th line made an error I asked first.

These are all I've done.
Thank you for your help.

body:
@asimshankar :

1st command
`ls bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/`
output is
`ls: bazel-genfiles/tensorflow/models/embedding/: No such file or directory`

2nd line
`bazel query --config=cuda 'somepath(//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package, //tensorflow/models/embedding:gen_word2vec)'`
output is
`WARNING: Config values are not defined in any .rc file: cuda`
`WARNING: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_Kusu/e92c2cbd4935130908d79abb3c6104b0/external/protobuf/protobuf.bzl:90:19: Variables HOST_CFG and DATA_CFG are deprecated in favor of string "host" and "data correspondingly.`
`WARNING: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_Kusu/e92c2cbd4935130908d79abb3c6104b0/external/protobuf/protobuf.bzl:96:28: Variables HOST_CFG and DATA_CFG are deprecated in favor of string "host" and "data correspondingly`
`//tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`
`//tensorflow/models/embedding:package`
`//tensorflow/models/embedding:gen_word2vec`

3rd line
`bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/tools/pip_backage:build_pip_package`
output is
`ERROR: /Users/Kusu/tensorflow/tensorflow/python/BUILD:612:1: Executing genrule //tensorflow/python:nn_ops_pygenrule failed: bash failed: error executing command /bin/bach-c ... (remaining 1 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.AbnormalTerminationException: Process terminated by signal 5.`
`dyld: Library not loaded: @rpath/libcudart.8.0.dylib`
`Referenced from: /private/var/tmp/_bazel_Kusu/e92c2cbd4935130908d79abb3c6104b0/execroot/tensorflow/bazel-out/hos/bin/tensorflow/python/gen_nn_ops_py_wrappers_cc`
`Reason: image not found`
`/bin/bach: line 1: 15171 Trace/BPT trap:5        bazel-out/host/bin/tensorflow/python/gen_nn_ops_py_wrappers_cc @tensorflow/python/ops/hidden_ops.txt 1 > bazel-out/local_darwin-opt/genfiles/tensorflow/python/ops/gen_nn_ops.py`
`Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build`
`Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps`

4th line made an error I asked first.

These are all I've done.
Thank you for your help.
